title: Foggy Night with Truck Headlights
description: The images depict a foggy night scene with a truck driving through dense fog. The headlights of the truck and other vehicles are visibly cutting through the fog. A streetlamp glows dimly overhead. The reverse side of one image shows the stamp 'Knickerbocker News Photo' and the handwritten word 'Fog.'
